name: Feel Better Fizzy

ingredients.name: Turmeric & Ginger Blend Enhanced Herbal Tea

preparation: Pour 3 cups boiling water over tea bags. Steep for 10 min. Remove tea bags and chill in refrigerator until cool, about 20 min.
Combine tea with kombucha; using a 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in lemon juice.
Pour over ice in a tall glass.
